thread.section_title: Merchant One Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Merchant One | merchantone.com
thread.title: Inga Bruce
thread.title_full: Merchant One reviewed by Inga Bruce

author: Inga Bruce
title: Inga Bruce
text: I am very pleased with the customer service at MERCHANT ONE. All of my questions and concerns were answered and dealt with in a very professional manner. Every person that I have spoken to has been extremely knowledgeable and courteous. This company has very competitive rates and no hidden fees. I am so happy I decided to give them a call and switch credit card processing companies!
